title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the Warriors taking game 5 of the NBA Finals and why the Boston Celtics came up short once again after having a lead in the 4th quarter. He defends Steph Curry for his poor shooting performance by sharing the other great players who have recovered from a bad game. He also believes LeBron James is fighting a battle he can't win at this point in his career. Plus, 6-time Pro Bowler Gerald McCoy joins the show to talk about where Baker Mayfield will end up and Lincoln Riley leaving his alma mater, Oklahoma, for USC. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
